image.description: A world map with colorful hula hoops connecting different countries
A group of serious-looking diplomats in suits attempting to hula hoop
A close-up of hands shaking inside a giant hula hoop
An astronaut on the moon with a hula hoop around their spacesuit
A pie chart made entirely of different colored hula hoops
A hula hoop being used as a peace symbol, with doves flying through it
A giant hula hoop encircling the United Nations building
A group of world leaders standing on a podium, each wearing a hula hoop as a sash
A random image of a pineapple wearing sunglasses, with the text 'In Conclusion' overlaid
